title: Add YAML frontmatter to GitOps agents and work-item-creation-agent
description: Four agent definition files are missing required YAML frontmatter for Claude Code agent discovery. The standard variant agents have proper frontmatter, but GitOps agents and work-item-creation-agent do not.
test_steps: 1. Verify which agents are missing frontmatter
2. Add YAML frontmatter to each missing agent following the standard pattern
3. Include name, description, and tools fields
5. Test agent discovery after adding frontmatter
acceptance_criteria: All agent .md files have valid YAML frontmatter
Frontmatter includes name, description, and tools fields
Agents are discoverable by Claude Code after restart
